CustomField.formula: IF( and ( social_science__c > 40, science__c > 40, hindi__c > 40, english__c > 40, percent__c >0.7), "First Class", IF( and ( social_science__c > 40, science__c > 40, hindi__c > 40, english__c > 40, percent__c >0.5), "second Class", IF( and ( social_science__c > 40, science__c > 40, hindi__c > 40, english__c > 40, percent__c >0.4), "third Class" , "fail")))
CustomField.label: devision on bases of marks
